title: 5/3/2017 - "1/4" Screen & DirectX Error Issues
body:
Hey fam,

There is currently an issue where some players are only getting a small fraction of their screen or getting a DirectX error.  We're tracking the issue now and believe that it might be the result of using a custom resolution, 4K screen, or resolution exceeding 1080p.

---
> **For Mac players**:  [Example screenshot here](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/302242899322601473/309346698331947018/Screen_Shot_2017-05-03_at_11.12.37_PM.png)
> 
> Tapping Alt+Enter in-game can serve as a work around.   This will toggle you out of fullscreen and into windowed mode to restore your game screen.

-----
> **For PC players**:  This may come up as a DirectX error
> 
> Delete your **Config folder**.  This  is typically found at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
> 
>As a heads up this will reset your resolution, settings, and keybindings to default.
> 

----

This thread is locked for commenting.  If you'd like to discuss this with Player Support or check for updates, find us on the [Help & Support](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nxyEq9WA-532017-14-screen-directx-error-issues) thread!
